casebody.data:
Case No. 8,969. MAGOUN et al. v. FIFTEEN THOUSAND DOLLARS.

[N. Y. Times,

Oct. 2, 1852.] Circuit Court, S. D. New York. 1852. Sai.vage — Amount op — Per Centum. Appeal from the district court of the United States for the Southern district of New York. Before NELSON, Circuit Justice.

Claim for salvage service. Decree of the ■ court below reversed, so far as salvage on the ! $15,000 is denied, and salvage to the amount of V/a per cent, allowed. 1
